description: How to install a double subfloor…I’m using a 3/4” (23/32) panel over another 3/4” layer. The second panel has to overlap the seams by at least 2 inches. The APA recommends using 1-1/2” screws so that they don’t penetrate the first panel. Our Gold and Platinum members have access to this full start-to-finish subfloor video series at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#carpentry #bathroomremodel #homerenovation
title: How to Install a Double Subfloor - #shorts #homerepairtutor
